snippet.title: THIEF 2 FAN-MISSION: A Very Thiefy Christmas Special [Experte][Deutsch]
snippet.description:
A Very Thiefy Christmas Special ist eine Fan-Mission von PukeyBrunster & Tannar
Zum spielen für Fan-Missionen [AngelLoader]: https://www.ttlg.com/forums/showthread.php?t=149706
Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kHPvRHRSg0Lsw-80Bbo12201zUAWnPRA/view?usp=sharing
Intro music by Martin Frömmig
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKyBRYM0iR1OWXvRcMTAF3Q 


00:00:00 Intro
00:03:45 skip Intro
00:04:27 tavern tasks
00:17:49 go outside
00:20:46 the new cook
00:23:22 city exploration
00:31:21 city watch station (dewdrop)
00:46:47 city exploration² (clock tower)
00:54:15 courthouse
01:00:07 shops in this city (diary, spice wine)
01:10:31 Church (Flute and Tiny Tim Quest)
01:26:53 a letter for mr. cross
01:28:41 Hang up a poinsettia
01:32:43 back to the City Watch
01:34:55 the lost child
01:42:25 ready for Christmas?
01:43:48 city exploration³
01:48:51 we meet santa
01:52:34 the jeweler (mirror)
01:58:02 Ice Garden
02:01:15 Merry Christmas
02:04:08 endscore


►Story:
Grab a hot cup of peppermint cocoa and snuggle into your favorite holiday jammies for a comfy, cozy little Christmas mission. 
 

►Folgenbilanz:
Beute: 3802
Gestohlen: 8 von 11
Locks Picked: 11
K.O.: 0
Tötung: 0
Verletzungen: 0
Secrets: 4 von 4


Datum der Erstveröffentlichung: 18.12.2024 
Author: PukeyBrunster & Tannar
Entwickler: Looking Glass Studios
Herausgeber: Eidos Interactive

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
➥Mein flauschiger Kanal: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheGarrettTMT
➥Fiep!: https://twitter.com/TmtGarrett
❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃❃
Tete Wete! :3
